definition: a staff/a rod/cane/walking stick/to flog with a stick (old)

sentences.english: There was a roar of anger from his fellows: Scabior drew his wand.
sentences.chinese: 他的同夥們怒吼起來，斯卡比奧拔出魔杖。

sentences.english: The conjurer waved his magic wand and pulled a rabbit out of the hat.
sentences.chinese: 魔術師揮舞魔杖，從帽子里拉出一隻兔子。

sentences.english: See wands page for details of wands made of willow.
sentences.chinese: 參見“魔杖”頁面，瞭解以柳木製成的魔杖的細節。

sentences.english: See wands page for details of wands made of willow.
sentences.chinese: 參見“魔杖”頁面，瞭解以柳木製成的魔杖的細節。

sentences.english: But she did not seem to be using it now. She was fighting with her stone knife.
sentences.chinese: 但這會兒她似乎沒使魔杖，她是用石刀在打仗。

sentences.english: From the tip of his wand burst the silver doe.
sentences.chinese: 他魔杖尖端跳出一隻銀色的牝鹿。

sentences.english: " Snape took his wand out and put it on Harry's chest.
sentences.chinese: ”斯內普抽出他的魔杖指向了哈利的胸口。

sentences.english: Love is a magic wand, which can turn boring life to glod!
sentences.chinese: 愛情，是一根魔杖，能把最無聊的生活點化成黃金。

sentences.english: The now-infamous" Wand Order Problem" was corrected in later editions of the book.
sentences.chinese: 目前身名狼藉的“魔杖倒序問題”在再版中被更正了。

sentences.english: His white hand pulled out the wand beneath his cloak and pointed it at the door, which burst open.
sentences.chinese: 蒼白的手從斗篷下抽出魔杖，指着房門，它砰然打開。

sentences.english: Snape's wand fell on the floor a few feet away.
sentences.chinese: 斯內普的魔杖落到了幾英尺外的地上。

sentences.english: One boy is playing football , one boy goes to snatch.
sentences.chinese: 獲勝者是那個能夠搶奪到對方魔杖的人。

sentences.english: So you can try the wand of dereferencing again to send the 13 over.
sentences.chinese: 這樣你可以使用魔杖，把13傳遞過去。

sentences.english: See wands page for details of wands made of rosewood.
sentences.chinese: 參見“魔杖”頁面，瞭解以紫檀製成的魔杖的細節。

sentences.english: See wands page for details of wands made of rosewood.
sentences.chinese: 參見“魔杖”頁面，瞭解以紫檀製成的魔杖的細節。

sentences.english: In the current version of the Magic Wand software, the name and the category of a POI are displayed.
sentences.chinese: 在目前版本的的魔杖軟件的名稱和類別的蒲顯示。

definition: a staff/a rod/cane/walking stick/to flog with a stick (old)
